name: Hold Monster
components: V, S, M/DF (one hard metal bar or rod, which can be as small as a three-penny nail)
text: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects any living creature that fails its Will save.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料/法器 (坚硬的金属棒或杆，小如钉子也可以)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘人类定身术 (hold person)’一般，不过它会影响任何意志豁免失败的活物。
